meanings.sent1: She hustles around the house to finish her chores.
meanings.sent2: The squirrel hustles up the tree to escape the cat.
meanings.sent3: The busy bee hustles from flower to flower collecting nectar.
meanings.sent4: Time hustles by when you're having fun.
meanings.sent5: The wind hustles through the leaves, creating a soothing sound.

meanings.definition: Engages in dishonest or illegal activities
meanings.sent1: He hustles unsuspecting tourists with fake designer goods.
meanings.sent2: The con artist hustles people out of their money with scams.
meanings.sent3: The pickpocket hustles through the crowded market.
meanings.sent4: The fraudster hustles his way into people's trust before deceiving them.
meanings.sent5: The swindler hustles his victims with promises of easy money.

meanings.sent1: She hustles the last piece of cake before anyone else can take it.
meanings.sent2: The bully hustles lunch money from the smaller kids.
meanings.sent3: The negotiator hustles a better deal for her client.
meanings.sent4: He hustles his way into getting the promotion he wanted.
meanings.sent5: The salesman hustles a reluctant customer into making a purchase.

meanings.sent1: His constant hustles at work have earned him a promotion.
meanings.sent2: The team's hustles on the field led them to victory.
meanings.sent3: The child's endless hustles around the playground tire out the parents.
meanings.sent4: The company's marketing hustles have increased their sales significantly.
meanings.sent5: She put all her hustles into organizing the event, and it was a great success.
